title: 35. "Let it Go" Finally Letting Go of Them
description:
Ever been involved in a toxic relationship but have had difficulty letting go of the person you were involved with? Ever continued to feel attracted to them without understanding why? Tune in to this week's episode of the podcast to learn where this comes from & why you should finally let. them. go.

Book of the month- The Human Magnet Syndrome by Ross Rosenberg

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think

Business Inquiries?
